title: Lostborn
description: LOSTBORN by Chris Jowers is the epic story of a warrior who must summon all his courage and fury to kill a horror his people refuse to believe in. When he was a younger man, Thulric Lostborn stood against a monster that hunted his people. He barely survived and lost those closest to him. In his older years he becomes the village blacksmith and his victory has faded from memory. A mist rolls across the land, one that heralds death and terror, a mist Thulric has endured before. Joined by Ragnhild, a hunter of beast and men, the Viking must succeed or the world that he knows will come to an end. LOSTBORN features stunning and evocative artwork by popular artist Mitch Foust.
author: Chris Jowers
